description.en: Ling Qi, a mischievous rabbit spirit, stole the Celestial Emperor's prized carrots and was punished with trials across three thousand lesser realms. In each realm, he diligently cosplays various roles, from pervert to villain, with one goal: sabotage the central couple! However, despite his intentions not to seduce anyone, his attempts often fail. As the trials progress, Ling Qi realizes that everything was manipulated by the Celestial Emperor…

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: ヒナとバンビ

description.en: Taku and Hinata are childhood friends who will be attending high school in the city this spring. Their daily life together in a village deep in the mountains, which had been taken for granted for so long, is vividly changed...?
description.id: Di musim semi sepasang teman masa kecil, taku dan hinata akan masuk ke sma di kota, keseharian bersama sepanjang waktu di sebuah desa pegunungan akan berubah...?!
description.vi:
Taku và Hinata là hai người bạn thuở nhỏ chuẩn bị nhập học tại Tokyo vào Mùa Xuân này. Lối sống thường nhật của họ ở quê nhà giờ chuẩn bị thay đổi sao...?
Một câu chuyện tình hài hước giữa hai người bạn thuở nhỏ trong sáng trong chuyện tình yêu nhưng lại quá thân thiết!
description.pt-br: Taku e Hinata são amigos de infância que estarão cursando o ensino médio na cidade de Tokyo nesta primavera. Sua vida diária juntos em uma aldeia no meio das montanhas, que havia sido tida como certa por tanto tempo, mudou vividamente…?

description.cs:
Krásná Athanasia byla zabita rukou svého biologického otce, chladnokrevného císaře Clauda de Alger Obelia! Je to jen hloupá pohádka na dobrou noc... dokud se jedna žena neprobudí a náhle nezjistí, že se stala onou nešťastnou princeznou! Potřebuje plán, jak přežít svůj odsouzený osud, a čas se krátí. Bude se řídit plánem A, žít co nejtišeji, aniž by si jí všiml nechvalně proslulý císař? Plán B, shromáždit dostatek peněz na útěk z paláce? Nebo jí zůstane plán C, sladkými řečičkami se dostat do otcovy přízně?!

description.de:
Wiedergeboren in einer Welt voller magischer Kräfte und als Tochter des Kaisers! Besser hätte es Athanasia kaum treffen können. Wäre nicht der Kaiser ein grausamer Tyrann, der sein Kind ablehnt und vernachlässigt. Noch als Baby wird Athanasia bewusst, dass in ihrem neuen Leben etwas ganz und gar nicht stimmt! Wenn sie nicht eine Überlebensstrategie entwickelt, wird sie an ihrem 18. Geburtstag auf Geheiß ihres eigenen Vaters sterben. So weit darf es nicht kommen. Also macht sich Athanasia daran ihr Schicksal zu verändern...

description.en:
When I opened my eyes, I had become a princess! But out of all the characters from this romance novel to be reborn into, why must it be the princess whose fate it is to die by the hands of her own blood-related father, the emperor?! If I want to live, I must never enter his sight. However…  

"Since when did this kind of scumbag start living in my castle?"

Without a single tear to shed nor a drop of blood to spill, that cruel and cold emperor, Claude! Will I, the Princess Athanasia who was caught by him, survive?

"I… What should I do…"

---
The beautiful Athanasia was killed at the hands of her own biological father, Claude de Alger Obelia, the cold-blooded emperor! It’s just a silly bedtime story… until one woman wakes up to suddenly find she’s become that unfortunate princess! She needs a plan to survive her doomed fate, and time is running out. 

Will she go with Plan A, live as quietly as possible without being noticed by the infamous emperor? Plan B, collect enough money to escape the palace? Or will she be stuck with Plan C, sweet-talking her way into her father’s good graces?!


---

description.fa:
آتاناسیا‌ی زیبا در سن ۱۸ سالگی به دست پدر خودش به قتل میرسه، کلود دِ الگر اوبلیا، یه امپراطور بی احساس! این فقط ی داستان شب بچگونس... تا اینکه دختره از خواب بیدار شد و فهمید به یه شاهزاده بدبخت تبدیل شده! اون برای زنده موندن از دست سرنوشتش به نقشه نیاز داشت، و یکمم زمان برای فرار. بنظرتون اون میتونه با نقشه A راحت زندگی کنه بدون اینکه مورد توجه امپراطور قرار بگیره؟ یا نقشه B، که میخواد پول کافی جمع کنه و بعدش بزنه به چاک؟ یاعم نقشه C؟ با شیرین زبونی و کاوایی بودن خودشو تو دل پدرش جا کنه؟!

description.fr:
Areu Areu, je dois sauver ma vie! Quand cette femme se réveille dans le corps d'une princesse, elle comprend vite qu’elle n’est pas devenu n’importe qui. Elle est Athanasia, célèbre héroïne de roman, qui meurt à 18 ans entre les mains de son impitoyable père, l'Empereur Obelia (Claude, pour les intimes). Elle n'a donc que quelques années devant elle pour changer le cours du destin. Evidemment, le plus simple serait de réussir à amadouer ce père qui la déteste. A moins de s'enfuir? Bon, pour cela il faudra déjà marcher plus vite qu'à quatre pattes!!

description.id:
Athanasia yang cantik terbunuh di tangan ayah kandungnya sendiri, Claude de Alger Obelia, kaisar berdarah dingin! Itu hanya cerita pengantar tidur yang konyol ... sampai seorang wanita bangun dan tiba-tiba menemukan dia menjadi putri yang malang itu! Dia membutuhkan rencana untuk bertahan dari nasibnya yang terkutuk, dan waktu hampir habis. Akankah dia pergi dengan Rencana A, hidup setenang mungkin tanpa diketahui oleh kaisar yang terkenal itu? Rencana B, kumpulkan cukup uang untuk kabur dari istana? Atau akankah dia terjebak dengan Rencana C, berbicara manis tentang kebaikan ayahnya?!

description.it:
La bella Athanasia fu uccisa per mano del suo stesso padre biologico, Claude de Alger Obelia, l'imperatore a sangue freddo! E' solo una sciocca storia della buonanotte... Fino a quando una donna si sveglia e scopre all'improvviso di essere diventata quella sfortunata principessa! Ha bisogno di un piano per sopravvivere al suo destino condannato, e il tempo sta per scadere. Sarà lei andare con il piano. A, vivere il più silenziosamente possibile senza essere notato dal famigerato imperatore? Piano B, raccogliere abbastanza soldi per sfuggire al palazzo? O lei sarà bloccata con il piano. C, parlare dolcemente percorrendo la strada per aggraziarsi il padre?

---

description.ja:
目を覚ましたらとあるネット小説の脇役姫、「アタナシア」というお姫様に転生していた。
しかし、アタナシアは父親の皇帝・クロードに見捨てられた姫で、周囲にも冷たく扱われている。
小説の中では、妹で主人公姫のジェニットに毒を盛った濡れ衣を着せられ、
１８歳の誕生日にクロードに殺されてしまう運命のアタナシア。
なんとしても死亡エンドを回避するため、お城を出る準備をこっそり進めていたアタナシアは、
ある日クロードの住む宮に入ってしまい――？

description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 떠보니 공주님이 되었다!

금수저를 입에 물고 태어난 건 좋은데,
하필이면 친아버지의 손에 죽는 비운의 공주라니!

피도 눈물도 없는 냉혈한 황제 클로드!
죽고 싶지 않다면 그의 눈에 띄어서는 안 된다.
그런데,

“언제부터 내 성에 이런 버러지가 살았지?”

황제의 눈에 띄어버린 아타나시아.
과연 그녀는 살아남을 수 있을까?

“나…… 어떡하지……?”

description.pl:
Piękna Athanasia została zabita przez własnego biologicznego ojca, Claude de Alger Obelia, zimnokrwistego władcę! To zwykła, głupiutka historia do łóżka... do czasu, aż pewna kobieta budzi się i odkrywa, iż jest tą nieszczęsną księżniczką! Potrzebuje planu, by przetrwać w wskazanej przyszłości, gdy czas ucieka. Pójdzie w ślady Planu A, żyć tak cicho jak to jest możliwe bez zauważenia przez niesławnego władcę? Plan B, zebrać wystarczająco pieniędzy żeby uciec z pałacu? Lub może utknie w Planie C, by słodką gadką wkupić się w łaski swego ojca?!

description.ru:
Когда я открыла глаза, то стала принцессой. Но почему из всех персонажей этой истории именно принцессой, судьба которой тесно переплетена с кровавым Императором? Если я хочу выжить, то должна быть неприметной для его глаз. «Когда это в моём дворце начали жить ничтожные людишки?». Человек, у которого нет ни капли сочувствия, ни слезинки — этот холодный император Клод! Неужели Атанасия, пойманная императором, сможет выжить? «Что… Что мне делать?..»

description.uk:
Прекрасна Атанасія загинула від рук власного батька, холоднокровного імператора Клода де Альджео Обелія. Це була просто дурнувата історія, щоб почитати перед сном… поки одна жінка не прокинулась у тілі той бідолашної принцеси! Їй потрібен план, щоб уникнути лихої долі, а час уже спливає. Чи слідуватиме вона плану А, і житиме тихо, не привертаючи уваги сумнозвісного імператора? Чи обере план B: зібрати побільше грошей і втекти з палацу? Чи застрягне на плані C, солодкими словами, добиваючись батьківської турботи.

altTitles.ja: ナルト
-ナルト-
NARUTO -ナルト-

altTitles.th: นินจาคาถาโอ้โฮเฮะ

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

altTitles.ja: なまいきざかり。

altTitles.en: His Cheekiness is in Full Bloom

description.cs: Jsem Yuki a nidky to nepřiznám. Nikdy. To co bych nikdy neudělala je přiznat se k tomi, že mám možná menší slabost pro mého drzého krásného spolužáka – který se chová jako nehorázný spratek – Naruse. Když už se o něm bavíme, místo toho, aby se soustředil na svou zvláštní středoškolní rivalitu s nějakým klukem jménem Shizuka, tak by se měl pustit do hry a soustředit se na náš kvalifikační zápas…!! Možná jsem toho od něj nakonec čekala až moc…
description.en: I, Yuki, have no intention of admitting it. Never. The last thing I will ever do is plead guilty to the crime of maybe possibly having a soft spot for my cheeky playboy of an underclassman—who’s an absolute brat—Naruse. Speaking of which, instead of focusing on his strange grade school rivalry with this Shizuka guy, he needs to get his head in the game and focus on our qualifiers…!! Maybe I was expecting too much from him, after all…
description.pt-br: Machida Yuki sabe que não quer nada com Naruse Shou. Mas como evitá-lo quando ela gerencia o grupo de basquete em que ele participa?!

altTitles.ja: 王の獣

description.en:
The world shared by humans and ajins (those who are half beast and half human) is not paradise. On the contrary, humans rule over ajins with strictness and contempt, using them at their own convenience: men as soldiers for their special powers and women as prostitutes, downgraded to the lowest rank.  
  
To change that destiny, Kogetsu serves the king under the guise of a man.

altTitles.ja: ラストマン

description.en:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.  
  
Source: MU

title.en: The Baby Dragon and the Rabbit Spirit

description.en:
Rabbit spirit, Bi-yeon, who has nothing to do except take care of rabbits, picks up a cute little dragon that was badly injured one day.
From that day onwards, he starts dreaming of his past life.

Among the divine beasts, the rabbit spirit 'Biyeon' is on the lowest level.
Although he is the highest level of divine beast, 'Do-ryu' was born with a prophecy that he would destroy the country.
Their meeting, disguised as chance, and his other self from his previous life, start opening his eyes to new things.

-

title.en: The End is a Game to Me

altTitles.en: The End Of World Is A Game

description.en:
Go Cheon-su, is an unemployed Game Streamer. With only 1 viewer.

One day, he is picked as a Player and is thrown into a real-world survival game.

The game clear condition is to not die. The 24*7 Survival Stream begins.

title.en: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja-ro: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja: うみねこのなく頃に散　Episode7:Requiem of the golden witch

description.en: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]

altTitles.ja: 日陰のアミル 追放されて無双する最強弓使い【タテスク】

description.en: Amir Waker is an archer who’s been banished from an S-Rank party [The Band of Prodigies], which mainly consisted of nobles. He then falsified his identity and registered himself as an F-Rank adventurer. He took an escort quest to the countryside. The quest was supposed to be an easy task for him as a former S-Rank. But surprisingly, the client of this quest is none other than the 3rd princess who’s being targeted for some certain reasons! Will Amir be able to escort the princess safely from the [strongest] knight’s division of the kingdom? Amir is thus dragged into the political struggles and conflicts of the kingdom.

altTitles.ja: ないしょのストーカーさん

description.en:
Kadoya is a resilient, hardworking, and gentle person, so he’s often pushed to do a lot of work.
He has this certain “secret”.
He is living strangely with someone he can't see.
When he comes home completely exhausted, there’s a hot bath and meal prepared for him.
And at night…
—— “He” comes to his side and holds him.
Kadoya feels so perfectly supported in everything, from housework to letting our sexual frustrations that it feels like he can’t live without “him” anymore...!

title.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

altTitles.pt-br: Sem querer seduzi o caçula do reino

altTitles.ru: Я случайно соблазнила младшего брата главного героя

altTitles.ja: 間違って男主人公の弟を口説いちゃった

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Vô Tình Quyến Rũ Em Trai Của Nam Chính

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---

description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---

description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

---

description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---

description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

description.en:
Is my cursed husband's fate up to me?
Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?
description.pt-br:
O destino do meu maldito marido depende de mim?
O marido de Madelyn, Ian, ficou destroçado depois da guerra e, por sua vez, tornou a vida dela um inferno. Fugindo de seu casamento condenado, ela encontra um fim trágico. Mas quando ela abre os olhos, ela se vê novamente com 17 anos. A guerra ainda não começou e Madelyn ainda pode mudar o seu destino. Mas e Ian?

description.en: At first, Yona gave some major side-eye to the popular game "Concubine Walkthrough" until she got sucked into it—literally! Now stuck as the villain, she has her hands full facing the infamously cruel emperor, shaking off scheming concubines, and befriending NPCs. There’s only one way the Game Master will let her out and that’s to become the Empress! Will she be able to stay true to her honest and straightforward self despite the palace’s intrigues? One extra problem: she’s got competition...
description.es: ¿Estás atrapado en el juego de realidad virtual <Concubine Attack>? ¡La única forma de volver a la realidad es ver el final de convertirse en emperatriz!

description.en: After being reincarnated to a year before her death, Bai Man's sole purpose in life is to kill the tyrannical emperor and take his place. To achieve her ultimate goal, she decides to seduce the formidable General Zhou Rong, a cold but beautiful woman. Who would have thought, however, that Zhou Rong is actually a crazy beauty?
description.pt-br: Depois de reencarnar um ano antes de sua morte, o único propósito de vida de Bai Man é matar o imperador tirano e tomar seu lugar. Para atingir seu objetivo final, ela decide seduzir o formidável General Zhou Rong, um homem frio, mas bonito. Quem teria pensado, entretanto, que Zhou Rong é na verdade uma mulher linda e maluca?

description.en:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

---

Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...

Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.sk:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

---

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

title.en: Kikaku Hazure no Eiyuu ni Sodate Rareta, Joushiki Hazure no Mahou Kenshi

altTitles.en: An Out of the Ordinary Magic Swordsman Brought up by a Nonstandard Hero

description.en: A young man who died in an accident while protecting a girl reincarnated in another world and was picked up by an old man. However, the old man wasn't just a person. Far from being just anybody, he was a "hero" who didn't understand common sense at all !! This is the story of a reincarnated person, Rain, who, fortunately or unfortunately, was raised by an unscrupulous hero and has acquired tremendous power. --Soon the boy grows up and makes a harem !?

altTitles.ja: 白山と三田さん

description.en: Tatsuhiko Shiroyama hates being stuck in the boonies. Greetings from strangers feels fake, part-time job prospects are limited, and he's been "blessed" with the nickname "Niyayama" from his classmates due to his creepy, unsociable attempts at smiling. He turned to the radio as a means to escape, and thinks about nothing more than saving up for a move to Tokyo where he can explore his passions. But Tatsuhiko's life changes forever when he saves a rich CEO from a rice paddy and is set up with his granddaughter, the equally as shy and antisocial Tamiko Mita. Together, the two stumble through the nuances of "dating", and Tatsuhiko's dreary days become a whole lot brighter.

altTitles.en: Get to the point instead of beating around the bush

altTitles.ja: 恋愛エトセトラ

description.en:
Just when Chu Hyejin, a freshman in college, is about to start her independent college life, she encounters a crisis. Her first love, Cha Haejun lives right next to her?! And on top of that, she is the one who dumped him when they dated in middle-school!  
  
A 15-year old's clumsy and awkward first love soon came to an end but will things be different this time when they're 20?  
  
(Note: Gatabutata is a Korean saying that means "Get to the point instead of beating around the bush".)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000950)
description.fr:
Au moment où Chu Hyejin, une étudiante de première année, est sur le point de commencer sa vie d'étudiante indépendante, elle est confrontée à une crise. Son premier amour, Cha Haejun, vit juste à côté d'elle ! Et en plus de cela, c'est elle qui l'a largué quand ils sont sortis ensemble au collège !

Le premier amour maladroit et gênant d'une jeune fille de 15 ans touche à sa fin, mais les choses seront-elles différentes cette fois-ci à 20 ans ?

(Note : Gatabutata est un dicton coréen qui signifie "Va droit au but au lieu de tourner autour du pot").
description.ja:
人生初の一人暮らしに胸をときめかせていた琴梨(ことり)。 しかし、引っ越し先のお隣に住んでいたのは中学の時に付き合ってた元カレだった⁉ 再会した初恋の彼ともう一度、甘酸っぱい恋を始める！

모든 게 서툴고 어색했던 중학교 2학년 15살의 첫 연애.
그렇게 헤어졌던 첫사랑을 같은 대학, 자취방 바로 옆집에서 다시 마주하다!
사랑이 뭔지, 연애가 뭔지 아직도 헷갈리고 서툴기만 한 스무 살. 과연 이번엔

如果再次遇见初恋，
你的选择还会一如从前吗？
在同一所大学与初恋邂逅，甚至发现他居然住我隔壁！二十岁的花季，对爱情还是懵懵懂懂，这次能否坦诚面对，最终有情人终成眷属？

description.en: "Would you like to have sex with me once?" Tsukioka's love life doesn't go well because his private parts are XL size.One day, his classmate Tokieda sees his private parts and proposes sex.Tsukioka, who worries about being too big, and Tokieda, who is loyal and greedy for what feels good, are a perfect fit in terms of compatibility and size!A limited-time sex friend relationship begins, “until the two find a girlfriend”, but they gradually begin to be attracted to each other's true faces...?A youthful tale of unrequited love between young people!

altTitles.ja: ネガくんとポジちゃん

description.en: Nega Shouya and Hoshi Sayaka are high school classmates. Nega is tremendously pessimistic, while Hoshi is optimistic, both to a fault. They also happen to be deeply in love with each other, but they completely misread each other's cues, him erring by defect, and her erring by excess. The fundamental law of magnetism states that opposites attract, and these two starkly different young lovers are not the exception!
description.es:
Nega Shouya y Hoshi Sayaka son compañeros de secundaria. Nega es tremendamente pesimista, mientras Hoshi es optimista, ambos a tal punto de que se vuelven falencias. También sucede que están profundamente enamorados el uno del otro, pero ambos interpretan mal las señales que se envían el uno al otro, él errando por defecto y ella errando por exceso. La ley fundamental del magnetismo dicta que los opuestos se atraen, ¡y estos dos amantes tan diferentes el uno del otro no son la excepción!  


---
description.fr:
Nega Shouya et Hoshi Sayaka sont camarades de classe.   
Nega est terriblement pessimiste, alors que Hoshi est une fille optimiste, à tel point que ça en devient pénible pour les deux.  
Ils s'aiment l'un l'autre mais interprètent mal les signaux qu'ils s'envoient. Lui, manquant de confiance, et elle, excessivement sûre d'elle. La loi fondamentale du magnétisme dicte que les opposés s'attirent et… ces deux amants si différents l'un de l'autre ne font pas exception à la règle !

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

title.en: The way to appeal to the Devil

description.en: Li Fei, who had to come out to "work" because his mother was seriously ill, was somehow caught up with a super rich boss. Not only was he asked to help the boss with work, but also to accompany him to eat and play? Then, Li Fei discovers that the true identity of his boss is the Devil himself…

altTitles.ja: 幸色のワンルーム

altTitles.es: Una habitación del color de la felicidad

altTitles.th: หนึ่งห้องแห่งความสุข

description.cs:
Jednoho dne dojde k únosu mladé dívky.
Pro ni je to ale nový začátek, poprvé začne doufat ve šťastný život. Ona mu slíbí, že si ho vezme. On se jí za to snaží do života vnést co nejvíc šťastných chvil.
Jedná se o únosce a jeho oběť… Tak proč k sobě mají tak blízko?
description.de: Sachi kommt mit ihren Eltern nicht klar und will einfach nur weg. Deshalb täuscht sie gemeinsam mit dem Typen, der sie immer stalkt, eine Entführung vor. Versteckt in dessen Einzimmer-Appartment machen die beiden einen Deal: Wenn sie mit der Entführungsnummer durchkommen, wird geheiratet...
description.en:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
description.es: Tras ser secuestrada, una chica desgraciada es feliz por primera vez. El día que la secuestran empieza una vida con un hilo de esperanza. Ella le promete a su secuestrador que se casarán y él le ofrece felicidad. ¿Cómo pueden tener una relación tan cálida siendo un secuestrador y su víctima?
description.id:
"Kalau berhasil lolos, kita akan menikah. Kalau tertangkap, kita mati bersama..."

Begitulah janji yang dilontarkan Sachi pada pemuda yang baru saja menculiknya. Dia yang tak punya tempat di manapun di dunia ini, merasa menemukan kebahagiaan di sisi penculiknya...
description.it:
Un giorno una ragazza di quattordici anni viene rapita. O almeno è quello che la polizia crede. In realtà la ragazza ha provato a fuggire dai violenti genitori e ha trovato rifugio… dal suo stalker, che ora la ospita nel suo appartamento.

Per quanto lui continui a pensare di aver commesso un rapimento, la ragazza è felice di quello che è successo e si dichiara a lui, promettendo che, in caso di cattura, si toglieranno la vita insieme.
description.ja:
薄幸な少女は誘拐されて“幸せ"を初めて知る。

その日、少女は誘拐された。
しかし、それは少女にとって一縷の希望にかけた生活の始まりだった。
少女は誘拐犯に結婚を誓い、誘拐犯は少女にたくさんの“幸せ"を捧ぐ。
被害者と誘拐犯の関係なのに―――どうしてこんなに温かいの?
pixiv&Twitterの超話題作が待望の書籍化!!!
半分以上が本書限定の描き下ろしエピソードを収録!!!
description.pl: W mediach zawrzało. Wieść o zaginionej nastolatce rozniosła się w mgnieniu oka. Policja nie wyklucza porwania. Nikt nie przypuszcza, że płaczący przed kamerą rodzice, od lat znęcali się nad córką. Nie mogąc dłużej tego znieść dziewczyna uciekła z domu i znalazła schronienie pod dachem tajemniczego młodego mężczyzny. Ściany pokoju, w którym teraz mieszka zdobi mozaika zdjęć zrobionych jej z ukrycia. Wybawcą nastolatki jest bowiem jej własny stalker. Choć dziewczyna przebywa z nim dobrowolnie i może odejść w każdej chwili, obydwoje zdają sobie sprawę, że jeśli ktoś pozna ich sekret, mężczyzna natychmiast zostanie skazany za porwanie. Nastolatka proponuje więc swojemu wybawcy niezwykły układ - jeśli zdołają ukryć się do czasu, gdy uzyska pełnoletniość, wezmą ślub. Jeśli złapie ich policja - obydwoje popełnią samobójstwo. Jaki będzie finał tej dramatycznej historii?
description.vi: Một cô gái 14 tuổi bị bắt cóc, nhưng lạ thay, cô không hề kháng cự, tthay vào đó, cô hứa sẽ kết hôn với chính kẻ đã bắt cóc mình, đổi lại anh phải che trở cho cô, đem lại hạnh phúc cho cô - thứ cô chưa từng được biết đến suốt 14 năm xuân xanh của mình. Một câu chuyện cảm động nói về 2 con người- 2 số phận bi đát tìm được nhau, liệu họ có trốn thoát khỏi những kẻ đang săn đuổi mình, liệu hạnh phúc có đến với 2 số phận bi đát kia không...? Chúng ta hãy chờ xem.

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

altTitles.ja: １日外出録ハンチョウ

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

Working beauty x working beauty. Romance stories about adult women.

This is a collection of short stories of 2 pages each, about various combinations of characters from the novel version of the "Saturday" series written by Seria Nina and illustrated by Hazuki Ruri.

title.en: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai

altTitles.ja: 義理の兄弟だけど恋人のふたりは堂々と付き合いたい

altTitles.en: Stepbrothers Are Dating and Want To Be Open About It

description.en:
Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house), secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.

A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps, he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.

On the other hand, Kazuma meets Yuuya's student, Matsubara, from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness, Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him.
He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school, with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...

A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular, soft-type older brother
The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...

altTitles.ja: ザ・ファブル

description.en:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___

altTitles.zh: 斩灵少女：我契约的全是上古神兵

description.en: Han Zhan traveled through time and space, where the girls could transform into magic weapons and fight under contract. The boy would awaken and become a spiritual contract master, and make a contract with them to resist the insect tide together. As a time traveler, he was shocked when he saw that those who were despised were actually famous ancient magic weapons. [Fuxi Qin], [Demon Refining Pot], [Shennong Ding], [Kunlun Mirror], [Nuwa Stone].

title.en: Bidou Wakadanna, Koi Shitau Wa Koushoku Otoko

altTitles.ja-ro: Bidou Wakadanna Koi Shitau Wa Koushoku Otoko

altTitles.ja: 美童若旦那、恋慕ふは好色男

altTitles.en: A Beautiful Young Master Longs for a Sensual Man

description.en: The stage is Edo. The second son of a draper store, Tenji is a beautiful boy that is earnest and kind as Bodhisattva. Tenji, who loves pretty things — especially hairpins — accidentally meets his favorite hairpin artisan, Shunsuke, one day, and ends up being shown around his workplace. Elated, he even follows Shunsuke to his home, but Shunsuke mistook Tenji for a woman and assaulted him! Shunsuke is actually a sensual man who welcomes all comers but never concerns himself with those who leave! And when he realizes Tenji is a man!? A beautifully and bewitchingly composed Edo picture scroll of passion of two straight men!

altTitles.ja: 迷宮の王

description.en:
Within the tenth-floor boss room of the Sazardon Labyrinth, the mighty minotaur awakens once more. Unlike its predecessors, slain at the hands of treasure-seeking adventurers, this monster’s primal urges push it further than ever before. Kill. Consume. Grow stronger. The more powerful its opponent, the more powerful it becomes. Even the very rules of the labyrinth seem to bend to its indomitable will. Can none triumph against this bovine behemoth? Will the minotaur ever meet its match…?

---

description.en:
A younger, tall, conceited female kouhai doing as she pleases towards her short senpai!   
A senpai who is teased about his height and treated as a kid…but unexpectedly shows a manly side of him!  
Will their relationship develop into romance…?
description.ru: Она подшучивает над его ростом и относится к нему как к ребенку, но погодите, кажется, низенький Сэмпай ей приглянулся! Но как им построить отношения с такой разницей в росте?

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

title.en: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru

altTitles.ja: 魔境生活 〜崖っぷち冒険者が引きこもるには広すぎる〜

description.en:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
description.ja:
実家を追い出されて冒険者になるも、堕落の一途を辿る主人公の青年。このままでは駄目だと一念発起した彼は、超辺境にある土地を購入して理想の住み処を作ろうとする。しかしその土地は『魔境』と呼ばれる、凶暴な動植物がうごめく超危険地帯であった！
日々命がけのサバイバルを生き抜き、徐々に逞しくなってゆく青年。そんな彼のもとに訳アリな住人たちも集まり生活が賑やかになるが、魔境を放っておかない勢力も現れて……！？

description.en: A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

title.en: Real Not Equal Game Root H

altTitles.ja: りある≠げえむ√H

description.en: Hinata is a playboy who conquers the men he's after like it's a game. So when he encounters Kaisei, a guy who loves otome games and is only interested in 2D men, he can't help but be interested in such a new kind of target. Unable to believe that someone wouldn't fall for him, Hinata gets desperate, and even starts playing Kaisei's beloved otome games in order to get closer to him. Will he be able to beat this game of love?!
description.es: Hinata, que es todo un playboy, está interesado en Kaisei, un chico fanático de los juegos otome; él entrará a ese mundo para lograr que Kaisei salga con él. Un día el deseo lo obliga a tener sexo, en ese momento recibe una llamada de Kaisei quien escucha todo por teléfono.
